'''Daffodil Burrows''' was a [[Harfoots|Harfoot]] who was once a part of a Harfoot caravan during the [[Second Age]]. Daffodil was invented by [[Amazon Studios]] for ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]''.

== History ==
Not much is known about Daffodil Burrows. At one point in time during the late [[Second Age]], she was lost to [[Wolves]] during one of the seasonal migrations, leaving her husband, [[Sadoc Burrows]], to grieve for her in spirit during the remembrance ceremony of the [[Harvest Festival]].

Later, as the sun rose after Sadoc is mortally wounded by the [[Mystics|Nomad]] at the [[East Bight]], he died believing in his heart that he would soon see his wife, Daffodil Burrows, again.
